welcome_message_body: Welcome to Busto Arsizio, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant destination has to offer. Buon viaggio!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the prompts to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
